title: Product Focused Tech Leader | Full Stack Engineer | MBA in Strategy & Product Management | Building Scalable Products with Business Impact
summary:
I’m a Software Engineer with 14+ years of global experience delivering scalable, high-performance solutions across fintech, cloud, and enterprise platforms. My expertise spans the entire software lifecycle — from architecture and design to hands-on implementation — using modern tech stacks like Java, Spring Boot, Microservices, Angular, React, Python, SQL, MongoDB, and deploying on AWS and GCP, along with expertise in building agentic applications in Azure AI Foundry.

At companies like Google, Walmart, and First Data, I’ve led the design and development of business-critical features; whether it’s crafting UI components with MAML/TypeScript, implementing OAuth2 authentication, optimizing backends for 15%+ performance gains, or delivering seamless third-party integrations for large-scale platforms. I’m adept at using Agile/Scrum practices, REST/SOAP APIs, CI/CD pipelines, and tools like Jira, GitHub, and Jenkins to drive continuous improvements and measurable business outcomes.

As an MBA in Strategy & Product Management and hands-on technologist, I bridge the gap between business and engineering, making sure every technical decision supports broader company goals. I’m always looking to collaborate on new ideas; let’s connect to explore innovation, technical excellence, and new opportunities!
